description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Pumpkin & Crème Fraîche Moroccan Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roasted Pumpkin & Crème Fraîche Moroccan Pancakes
name: Roasted Pumpkin & Crème Fraîche Moroccan Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tsp Moroccan spice blend plus Moroccan spice blend

recipeInstructions.text: Serve pancakes accompanied with streaky bacon, avocado, tomatoes, toasted sesame seeds, a good dollop of Bulla Crème Fraîche and a sprinkle of additional Moroccan spice blend.
